scripts.build: yarn run build:customer && yarn run build:admin && yarn run build:manager
scripts.build:customer: cross-env NODE_ENV=production FRONTEND_MODULE=customer NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm" webpack --config webpack_config/webpack.config.ts
scripts.dev:customer: cross-env NODE_ENV=development FRONTEND_MODULE=customer NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm" webpack serve --config webpack_config/webpack.config.ts
scripts.start:customer: cross-env NODE_ENV=development FRONTEND_MODULE=customer NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm" webpack serve --config webpack_config/webpack.config.ts
scripts.build:admin: cross-env NODE_ENV=production FRONTEND_MODULE=admin NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm" webpack --config webpack_config/webpack.config.ts
scripts.dev:admin: cross-env NODE_ENV=development FRONTEND_MODULE=admin NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm" webpack serve --config webpack_config/webpack.config.ts
scripts.start:admin: cross-env NODE_ENV=development FRONTEND_MODULE=admin NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm" webpack serve --config webpack_config/webpack.config.ts
scripts.build:manager: cross-env NODE_ENV=production FRONTEND_MODULE=manager NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm" webpack --config webpack_config/webpack.config.ts
scripts.dev:manager: cross-env NODE_ENV=development FRONTEND_MODULE=manager NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm" webpack serve --config webpack_config/webpack.config.ts
scripts.start:manager: cross-env NODE_ENV=development FRONTEND_MODULE=manager NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm" webpack serve --config webpack_config/webpack.config.ts
